arStrings.szText: {c_important}Evading{/c} through an enemy infected by {c_important}Shadow Imbuement{/c} grants {c_important}{u}Stealth{/u}{/c} for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds. Breaking {c_important}{u}Stealth{/u}{/c} Heals you for {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} of your Maximum Life.

{c_important}Evading{/c} through an enemy infected by {c_important}Shadow Imbuement{/c} grants {c_important}{u}Stealth{/u}{/c}. Breaking {c_important}{u}Stealth{/u}{/c} Heals for {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} Maximum Life.
